turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to place a starbucks order for me

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: now that i think of it, please also order me a blueberry muffin

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok i've ordered you a grande cappucinno with 2% milk and a blueberry muffin at the westford starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your order will be ready for pickup shortly

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you will be receiving a text message on your phone with the details of your order including the receipt

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: perfect. thank you very much for your assistance

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're most welcome. is there anything else i can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: no thank you. have a good idea
